meanings.definition: To come into existence or notice
meanings.sent1: The sun has arisen in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The flowers have arisen from the ground.
meanings.sent3: The idea suddenly arisen during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: Hope has arisen from the ashes of despair.
meanings.sent5: The truth has arisen like a bright beacon in the darkness.

meanings.sent1: The hot air balloon has arisen into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The bird has arisen gracefully into the air.
meanings.sent3: The kite has arisen high above the trees.
meanings.sent4: The moon has arisen over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The elevator has arisen smoothly to the top floor.

meanings.sent1: A misunderstanding has arisen between them.
meanings.sent2: A problem has arisen that needs to be solved.
meanings.sent3: A new opportunity has arisen unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: A solution has arisen from their collaboration.
meanings.sent5: A sense of urgency has arisen in the situation.
